alert.note: Alert for Clay; Marion; Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 4:23PM EST until January 04 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION...NORTHWESTERN PUTNAM AND SOUTHEASTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 423 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near World Golf Village to near Bostwick to near Orange Springs, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, East Palatka, George`s Lake, Bostwick, Federal Point, Orange Mills, Orange Springs, Bardin and Hollister. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for northern and northeastern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
